articles.title: NASA Selects SpaceX Starship to Land Next Americans on Moon - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA is getting ready to send astronauts to explore more of the Moon as part of the Artemis program, and the agency has selected SpaceX to continue development of the first commercial human lander that will safely carry the next two American astronauts to the…
articles.content:
Illustration of SpaceX Starship human lander design that will carry the first NASA astronauts to the surface of the Moon under the Artemis program. Credit: SpaceX

articles.author: YVONNE TAN
articles.title: Citi's exit from consumer banking is 'no surprise' - The Star Online
articles.description: NEWS that American banking group Citigroup Inc is closing down its consumer banking business in 13 markets, including Malaysia, does not come as a surprise and has ignited fresh concerns that competition in the banking space can only get more heated.

articles.title: Brazil asks women to delay pregnancy over new coronavirus variant fears - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: SAO PAULO - Brazil asked women on Friday to delay getting pregnant until the worst of the pandemic passes, saying the virus variant that is devastating the South American country appears to affect expectant mothers more than earlier versions of the coronaviru…
